metadata.comments: Azure Sentinel playbook to send approval request to the SOC team to approve incident response actions
metadata.author: Shivniel Gounder

body.message:
MDATP Results:

The hash values were detected on the following devices (Device name, Device ID):

@{variables('MDATPVulnDev')}

Virus Total Results of the hash value (Total positive detection, Total AV Scan):

@{variables('VTPositive')} / @{variables('VTTotal')}

IP Health Score:

IP:  @{variables('IP')}

ISP: @{variables('IPISP')}

City: @{variables('IPCity')}

Organisation: @{variables('IPOrg')}

Fraud Score: @{variables('IPFraudScore')}

body.Query:
let fileHash = "@{items('For_each')?['Value']}";
find in (DeviceFileEvents, DeviceProcessEvents, DeviceEvents, DeviceRegistryEvents, DeviceNetworkEvents, DeviceImageLoadEvents)
where SHA1 == fileHash or InitiatingProcessSHA1 == fileHash
|distinct DeviceName, DeviceId

Message.Subject: Azure Sentinel Action Required: @{body('Alert_-_Get_incident')?['properties']?['incidentNumber']}
